content: fish amigurumi - crochet pattern this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free version of this crochet pattern you ll find that this tropical fish amigurumi works up super fast and has so much potential for fun color combinations the main body portion is worked up as one piece and then the fins and tail are sewn on at the end when finished the fish is approximately 4 5 inches long from nose to tail and 2 inches wide materials -worsted weight yarn -safety eyes i used 8 mm size -3 5mm crochet hook -fiber based stuffing -yarn needle if you love ocean themed amigurumi projects please check out the whole collection in the ocean friends amigurumi listing you can get all of the ocean amigurumi patterns including this one together in one ebook with a clickable table of contents for easy navigation you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
